metadata.title: CVE-2020-12672 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
GraphicsMagick through 1.3.35 has a heap-based buffer overflow inReadMNGImage in coders/png.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12672` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.4+really1.3.35+hg16297-1
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.4+really1.3.35+hg16297-1
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.4+really1.3.35+hg16297-1
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.4+really1.3.35+hg16297-1
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.4+really1.3.35+hg16297-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4+really1.3.35+hg16297-1').
